english version v2 2/8 part 3b slot this is where the slot is built so that the sphere can open and hide a soft toy inside on this sphere which is 100 st the slot is 40st long which covers 2 slices cast on 4 stitches with the main colour on using two extra dpn repeat above 40 times the left needle k4 skpo yf s1 yb there are now 6 cast off the 5 last stitches stitches on the right dpn as for i-cord slip the right dpn into those stitches so that they are ready to knit again on the left needle with the main colour make sure the new row is not twisted knit the new row with the main colour cast on 40 stitches bringing the black yarn in the back using the trapping the floats at each stitch technique detailed in this pattern part 3c single decrease every row row 28 repeat 5 times yo kb
